attributes.action: Call for the resignation of the Archbishop of Canterbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the head of an organisation (the Anglican Church) funded by the British Taxpayers he should be held to account by the wishes of those people. 
His call for religious organisations to be given a status that is above the law poses a direct threat to law and order and he should resign.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
